p: It is, however, the virus’ infectivity which has prompted fears that it could become endemic. “It is substantially less lethal than SARS but a lot more infectious”, Hunter said. “On the other hand, it is substantially less infectious than seasonal influenza, but more lethal”. As a result, the degree of severity has been exaggerated by the data so far: while almost all the extreme and fatal cases have been notified, there has been considerable underreporting of mild cases. Early data on closed cases, that is people who had either died or recovered, indicated a fatality rate as high as 20%. At time of writing, however, the death rate among more recent cases had subsided to about 1.5% with the highest risk for the elderly.
